name: Magemania
description:
Magemania is a Hidden Object Puzzle where the player has to get out of
castle fortresses, solving riddles, finding secrets and avoiding traps. In the castle to the player
you need to show ingenuity and logical thinking in order to correctly open all the doors and not
fall into the hands of skeletons that are hidden everywhere.

Movement is carried out using the arrows on the keyboard, or the WASD keys.
To activate the lever or open the chest, you need to shoot them with magic by pressing LMB.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics.
- Fascinating puzzles.
- Traps and secrets.
